roleset.name: to evaluate, appraise, estimate the value of
roleset.note: Member of Vncls assessment-34.1, assess: estimate-34.2, price-54.4.

example.name: All args, financial domain
example.text: He assessed the value of the accommodation provided at $80 per week.

example.name: All args, non-financial
example.text: He assessed the situation as a battle between his two selves.
example.arg: as a battle between his two selves

predicate.note: Frames file for 'assess' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to charge with a tax, fine, or special payment

example.name: Args 0, 1, 2
example.text: It assessed nearly $ 500,000 [*U*] against a cruise-ship company that [*T*-1] carried about 100 deckhands , cooks , bartenders , entertainers and other employees as self-employed independents .
example.arg: against a cruise-ship company that [*T*-1] carried about 100 deckhands , cooks , bartenders , entertainers and other employees as self-employed independents

example.name: Args 0,1,2
example.text: If both agencies find violations of the U.S. trade law, the U.S. would assess penalty duties on the imports, which already are subject to import quotas under bilateral textile and apparel trade agreements.
example.arg: If both agencies find violations of the U.S. trade law
on the imports, which already are subject to import quotas under bilateral textile and apparel trade agreements.
